name: Operation: Haunted
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Move: Arrrow Keys
  • Jump: Z
  • Shoot: X

Terminate Ghosts scattered in a Haunted House by shoooting them down.  You as a  robot must traverse the house find keys and unlock doors. Complete the game when every last ghost is down.

Music: Mystical Pixels by TeknoAXE Video Link Channel Link
